website_summaries.verdict: While it's not feature loaded, the Beoplay H4's sound quality and comfort level earn it the right to be in the conversation if you're considering a full-size Bluetooth headphone for around $300.
pros: The B&O Play by Bang and Olufsen H4 is a very comfortable, excellent-sounding Bluetooth headphone with decent battery life
cons: It doesn't come with a carry case and has a small annoying quirk with the power button as well as an expensive price for a headphone with no active noise-cancellation

website_summaries.verdict: The B&O Beoplay H4 headphones deliver a wonderful Bluetooth audio experience and look particularly good doing it.
pros: Excellent audio performance with bright, detailed highs and deep, rich bass

customer_reviews.title: Love them but one qualm
customer_reviews.text: Looks - world class Feel - world class Comfort - world class Only gripe is they're pretty lame in terms of noise cancellation. This works both ways - so if someone sits next to you and you have your music on mid level volume they can hear it pretty clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Can’t charge, won’t charge :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and managed to charge them fine the first time, but since then the headphones don’t recognise the charger cable, no matter which plug socket or USB plug I use. They still work fine with the audio cable but that kind of defeats the point of having wireless headphones, so I’m returning them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rose

customer_reviews.title: comfort is 100% better than with Bose earphones ( was a Bose fan ...
customer_reviews.text: comfort is 100% better than with Bose earphones ( was a Bose fan for about 8 years but now have chucked my companions for these!) also very stylish. response time isn't super fast when changing songs over the bluetooth buttons on the headphones, however i suspect its like that with all wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, had for a while now and no problems
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, had for a while now and no problems, battery life is amazing! Perfect pair of headphones. Recommend highly. Arrived quickly and have great sound quality which you can change using the app
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and solid sound, better than beats solo.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good sound. Only issue is that they are not collapsable. However compared to the beats solo 3, much better fit around the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best build wuality
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a month now and had them in my backpack while walking back from town. When I went to take them out one of the ear cups had completely broken off. They were at the top of the bag, and the bag wasn’t even full
customer_reviews.author: ItsTom

customer_reviews.title: Not the best  b&o headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got them friday usd them on the bus on the way to work but they don't block sounds on the busand people chatting like my bose do? But the sound is fab from my iPad and my apple pro. But not that good from my apple phone ????? U need to get a case for them because they don't look that stong and if you have a big head dont think they will fit you thay or expanding but not a lot .so try some on in a shop before you send off for them
customer_reviews.author: steff

customer_reviews.title: B&O >>>> Beats/Razor Couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: Sound as it should be! TOP stuff. B&O >>>> Beats/Razor Couldn't be happier with this product. You can really you forget that you have something on your head. Very comfortable. Love the materials too.
customer_reviews.author: G10X

customer_reviews.title: fabulous sound quality
customer_reviews.text: amazing sound quality - crisp and clear; and beautifully designed, all the better for not looking plasticy. I don't know how I did my commute without them. They make my journeys peaceful, even without anything being played as these cover you're whole ear. I find them very comfortable to wear. Only gripes are there's no case in the box -- which surprised me at this price point -- and sometimes it's difficult to get the Bluetooth connection established with a new device -- easily solved by using the cable rather than Bluetooth to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Zedness

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have to be heard to be believed, the sound output is amongst the best I've experienced and at the price I paid an absolute bargain. They are comfortable, fit over the ears perfectly and even though they do not have noise cancelling I'm not sure you need it as the the fit is very tight whilst not being uncomfortable. Somehow they have managed to create a pair of headphones that deliver a beautiful deep rich bass whilst not over powering the mids and the highs. Just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SIMON JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: They are good, but not sure if they are 299 pounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it's very comfortable to wear. I can wear it for hours without needing a break. It's light and has soft leather. It sounds good. It elevates the highs and lows while still preserving the mids. It also gets very loud on Bluetooth. Cons: The buttons are too close together, it can be hard to identify lolume - and +, and pause/play buttons. Lack of noise cancellation. Also, alow charge via micro USB is a bummer when most other gadgets are going USB C. In overall, I think these headphones are great and the cons do not bother me too much as I only paid 150 pounds on a black Friday deal.
customer_reviews.author: marcelo silva

customer_reviews.title: Normally Bang & Olufsen does not provide the best sound. You would suspect Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Not high end, you would need a Stax headphone for that (around 4.000 pounds), but quite neutral for a cheap price. I didn't expect anything, but the quality surprised me. Normally Bang & Olufsen does not provide the best sound. You would suspect Sennheiser, AKG and Beyer to be better.This product though does provide the best quality achievable in this price range. It's comfortable, well manufactured and connects without any problem to all my devices. If you desire something more spectacular you should try Bose or Sony. The sound of these last two is more commercial, but not good enough for me. But after all you cannot discuss taste and colour. .
customer_reviews.author: FantaStick Film Club

customer_reviews.title: Wireless not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as they are a premium brand (with a premium Price) and to be fair they sounded pretty good, noise cancellation not so good however the main problem is the wireless function has stopped working, I have tried the "Reset" and it made no differance, I have had them for a year and a half but with reletively little use (few hours twice a week) so I would have expected them to have lasted longer. They say" buy cheap buy twice " didn't think buy expensive buy twice!! and reading the revues on customer help I don't think I'll waste my time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Michelle Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Download the app when you get them! It transforms them!
customer_reviews.text: This product having read the reviews has exceeded my expectations. When I connected them originally the sound was ok. I had issues switching devices but the support from Bang and Olufsen was quick and effective. I decided to download the app and I am so glad I did. These headphones come alive when you set your preferences and are far better than my old Audio-Technkca AH-50s. The battery life is also very good. Lasts for several days of frequent usage between charges. These headphones don't have a noise cancelling function but they do block out a lot of noise due to their design. They are also super comfortable. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: rgbez

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is extremely expensive, i would say that it is worth it. The sound is quite amazing, the passive noise cancellation is really good which is to be expected for a over-ear pair of headphones. The battery life is something that i didn't think would be this good. During the week, i would use the headphones for a few hours every day and it would still get me through the weekend. It charges quickly and i would advise anyone that has this item not to overcharge (just like with any other battery). All in all, great quality, great sound, great noise cancellation and amazing battery life. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Ciubotariu

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Real leather and great craftsmanship, super comfortable to wear. I have noise cancelling wired Bose for aeroplane travel, these B&O are NOT nc headphones, so know what you are buying! Top features: listening over BT works flawlessly Battery charge lasts an age (probably 50h at a guess) voice call capabilities are great, with crystal clear reception Great materials, you can feel where your money has gone and comfortable solid, they don't fold - which I view as a positive Downside Pairing was not at all well documented, and yet was so easy when I finally figured it out
customer_reviews.author: DoubleVeteran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Great sound, comfy and the battery lasts for ages. I wear mine while working (9-5 weekdays) and rarely have to charge them-once a month, if that. Not to mention they’re stunning!! I’m not a music expert to comment on the sound quality, but it sounds good to me, and there’s an app so you can alter the bass settings etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Walker

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent set of headphones. Quality is good, they’re sturdy, and battery life is superb with a single charge taking less than an hour and lastly a whole week - I probably use them for four hours a day. Noise cancellation isn’t great but then again my understanding they never claimed to incorporate this feature. If you’re travelling a lot by plane you might want to upgrade, but they’re great travelling on public transport. Lastly, I occasionally have them turned up and my wife has confirmed she can’t hear anything, so these headphones do not annoy those around you.
customer_reviews.author: Zimri-lim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 😉
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always favoured Bang & Olufsen for YEARS and these do NOT disappoint. They are Amazing. Only wee flaw I would say is that you can make them Larger if you have a bigger head However, like me if you got a Small head. You can’t make them smaller. Not a Big deal as the still fit etc but still, for the price you think you’d be able to adjust the size I.E make them Bigger & Smaller. But there still Amazing and WAY BETTER than Beats.
customer_reviews.author: catherine queen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery prompt. I bought these for my 97 year old mum who can no longer hear any music through the channels on the TV. Sound quality is good and comfortable to wear. Only downside is that I have to set them up for mum. She can’t cope with charging them or even finding the tiny buttons to operate the sound or switch on and off. I guess that would be the same for any technology though.
customer_reviews.author: darcybabes

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Only had these a day and I’m so impressed. Always had Bose in the past but intend on using these at home so no need to pay extra for noise cancellation . Sound is amazing, never heard better, and has ample volume unlike some headphones. Quality as you would expect is excellent and very comfortable. I wore them all day when I got them. Bluetooth range is very good, left my phone downstairs and went upstairs with no loss. Bluetooth pairing is easy, have linked to iPhone and 2 TVs without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James D. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a replacement for my old Bose ones. I didn’t think I would get a good replacement set, however I have a great set in my new B&O’s. Battery life is great I have only charged them up once since getting them. So my only dislike is redundant as it’s because they don’t let you know how low the battery is getting. As I said charged once in over two months nice one B&O.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Couper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my in the ear headphones as they were causing me some problems. The H4’s are brilliant, they are really comfortable and the sound quality is amazing. An added bonus was taking advantage of the Black Friday deal, however even at full price they are still excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality below expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought BeO H4 following a number of very positive reviews (I couldn't try them before buying) and I'm a bit disappointed - the sound quality is far below expectations and it doesn't matter if I use BT or a cable connection. The scene is narrow, bass is deep but rumble, there's lack of treble. The sound is dark with lack of details. I expected a bit more for this price. I enjoy the wireless, mobility and long battery life - ideal combination when I'm on the move. But when it comes to the good sound quality I still prefer my old, cable AKG 550 which cost a half price of BeO H4.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Siemieniuk

customer_reviews.title: Try another Brand
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 days very dissatisfied for someone who loves music I was looking forward to listening to my ipod with my new headphones...
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: long term review
customer_reviews.text: brilliant, had them 3 years now no issues still hold charge and very durable im a bit heavy handed and not broken them yet. excellent sound quality my brothers a composer and prefers them to his seinheisers. plus bluetooth is a no question, cables suck
customer_reviews.author: the man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these headphones is very impressive. It's brought new life my collection and has resulted in me getting a Spotify subscription! They also feel solid. The cushioning is very comfortable and I'm able to wear them for hours on end without getting a sore ears or head.
customer_reviews.author: BelfastDad

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy of the B&O name
customer_reviews.text: Having never splashed out on big brand headphones before, I finally took the plunge when I saw these on sale at £120 Packaging and construction of the headphones was first class. However, the noise escape was absolutely unacceptable. Even at moderate volume the person next to me could hear what I was listening to. Disappointment was an understatement. I had them out the box for less than 5 mins before I repackaged and started the return. Appreciate they are entry level headphones but they are still B&O. Not worthy of the name.
customer_reviews.author: Jasdeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD...
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I've had by far. Never thought I'd spend so much on a pair of headphones but I'm glad I did. Good connectivity, amazing sound quality and good noise cancellation. Its a top quality product from a top quality brand 10/10
customer_reviews.author: AceAidan

customer_reviews.title: great sound, poor noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves them. They are so comfy and the sound quality is excellent and he now says makes our other speakers sound rubbish. However, you can literally hear everything he is listening to when they are above half volume. The noise cancellation is really bad! I can't work out why?! I suggested we sent them back because I was worried about him annoying people on the bus but he loved them too much and wouldn't let me! He's happy anyway, even if no one else around him is!!
customer_reviews.author: Feefeemcfirefly

customer_reviews.title: Clean design, warm sounds, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels comparable to similar premium products on the market, good sound quality as expected, warm and balanced. Easy to pair with device each time once initial set-up done. Of note it is still comfortable to wear over glasses for long periods, which cannot be said of some other brands!
customer_reviews.author: hamandcheese

customer_reviews.title: Bargain at this price
customer_reviews.text: Importantly they fit my big head, and they are tuned to the type of music i listen to. The bass strong without booming, the mids clear, and the treble sharp. They seem very well made with quality materials, the ear cups especially comfortable. I like the B&O app on your phone where I can pair with the headphones and change the tone (more than you would expect to). Not sure if they are the best i've tried at £250, but at £100 a complete bargain. Very quick delivery from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great design but poor noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Tried them for a few weeks but ended up returning them as they just didn't keep out any more noise - wasn't expecting them to be noise cancelling, but could hear every conversation going on around me in the office, even at a decent volume. They look great and were really comfortable, but I went for a Bose pair at a similar price point that have much better noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Steff Mulrooney

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: amazing quality audio and battery and very comfortable. unfortuntly after only 2 months the stiching of L came undone, i had never touched it once and take extreme care of product. for such high quality brand very disappointing. as the seller is 3rd party amazon could not give a replacement and only refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really decent pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great for listening to music in the office, out and about and at home. When using them for phone calls, if there is background noise or you're outside then the person on the other end of the line may struggle to hear you. Not officially noise cancelling headphones but the fit around the ears is great and it does quieten down the background noise. As you'd expect from B&O the sound quality is great so even at low volume the music, radio, audiobook is all you will hear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Clear, accurate and true. No gimmicks Sound as it's meant to be! If a song has bass you will hear it but if it doesn't then you won't. You will hear what you are supposed to hear Simples
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Definite recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They don’t claim to be noise cancelling and they really aren’t but I got for them gym so having a small bit of noise leakage suits me. They’re really comfy, they stay put and the battery life is very impressive. The sound quality isn’t crystal clear but it’s the best I’ve heard for wireless headphones and I’ve had no issues at all with the connection dropping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie M.

customer_reviews.title: BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality, listen to an album you've listened to many times before and I'm sure you'll hear so many noises / instruments that you've never noticed before. AMAZING value on the black Friday deal. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Iain F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, enhanced by a B@O app. Very comfortable, able to wear for long periods. Only negative, off button engages Siri prior to turning off. Overall good product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, excellent sound quality, and I love the ability to connect with either Bluetooth or a 3.5mm jack cable to switch between general listening and professional use with a mixing desk. Noise cancellation is passive, not active, but unless you’re frequently in a super loud environment (frequent flier, perhaps) you probably won’t need active noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this. Not only was it very uncomfortable, it also leaked a lot of sound and the sound quality was terrible for the price. I've used budget headphones that have sounded better. At this price point simply not worth it - and I got it on a black friday sale. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: adf

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged well. The sound cancellation is amazing and the quality is definitely reflected in the price! The battery lasts for ages and they aren't too heavy so can be worn for running or in the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Isobel Heer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these, especially as there is a free app that allows some equaliser functions to be used. Work great with nice sound (she said better than her old Bose units!).
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of headphones I have ever had, enjoying the sound more than in bose. So happy with it I got another one for my wife and she loves them too
customer_reviews.author: tomik jaroslav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headphone. So stylish and beautiful and all I had is all round compliments about them. Sounds is as good as it can be. Battery lasted for a week with 2 -3 h using a day.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kingsman

customer_reviews.title: 6 week review. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, built great, functionality is simple and unfussy. I'm not really into gadgets, so to have something like this that works so well out of the box was brilliant. One charge lasts about a week of regular use. They do make me look like a cyber man but I see this as a plus. Recommended. Had them for six weeks, daily use, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: EddieYouds

customer_reviews.title: Quality the name speaks for itself
customer_reviews.text: It's simple you get what you pay for ,these are stunning headphones and if you listen to quality music you need these .they look like they are worth double what they sell for .music is clear crisp best headphones I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and effective to use
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is in place, the delivery speed is fast, the price is good, the sound is clear, and the charging speed is fast.
customer_reviews.author: NING XIE

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Headphones very stylish and the bass is unbelievable, along with the sharpness in the treble. Arrived quickly and was well packaged. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Harris

customer_reviews.title: B&O quality
customer_reviews.text: No problem with these - very good as you would expect of B&O. Very comfortable to wear, easy to set up, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Holkham

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Sound is great but not as perfect as more expensive models. Really soft leather. They look really nice. And are super comfy with the memory foam padding. Battery lasts a v long time. Controls are good but it wouldn’t hurt to have a few more buttons, so that you’re not using one button for on/off/play/pause/skip tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ward

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incredible headphones with amazing sound quality and the best battery life you could wish for. Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.author: Lego obsessed

customer_reviews.title: Still a competitive choice vs new range
customer_reviews.text: Quite good for a discontinued line. It keeps deliver at the standard of newer and more expensive one. Microphone ok although not perfect. Missing a bit of tap touch!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Depauw

customer_reviews.title: sound great
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with these , first time I,ve splashed the cash on headphones and I can tell the difference between these and others I,ve had, plus they pair really easily to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sillyboy12345

customer_reviews.title: great headphone super sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife and she absolutely loves them the sound quality is superb and comfort is superb may buy one for myself
customer_reviews.author: ian62

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as a xmas gift for my husband. He is very happy with them and said they have good sound quality but not the greatest in noise cancellation. One charge last for ages as well
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are as expected from B&O, superb quality and sound. Easy to use when set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones!
customer_reviews.text: What a great sound and very comfortable! Took me ages to chose these and I think I got the right ones! The cost was good for this quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Left headphone was low and the right one was loud
customer_reviews.author: Mr R.frank

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! they are really comfortable even after long wear and the sound is really good. The battery life has lasted a long time and the bluetooth connects really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JonesReviews

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE A REVELATION
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these headphones for a few hours and already I am amazed at the quality of the sound. It is like listening to my recorded music with new ears. The clarity, the bass balance, are fantastic. I am looking forward to many more hours rediscovering my music collection. I think I shall start with the Beethoven quartets . . .
customer_reviews.author: Anfechtungen

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect , like carrying round a big speaker with you wherever you go
customer_reviews.author: Eric Osei-Wusu

customer_reviews.title: excellent package
customer_reviews.text: they are so light you don't even know you're wearing them. very good range with the Bluetooth. could use just a little more bass and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Beege

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of headphones, but there are much better products at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent pair of headphones, but there are much better products at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones, got them in the Black Friday sales so they were a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: rachel malkin

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose!
customer_reviews.text: No active noise cancelling - but that's a good thing as the sound quality is not impaired by this. Great battery life and fantastic sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfortable and stylish headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of headphones. The build quality is premium as you would expect of a B&O product and the sound quality is crystal clear. All in all I’m very pleased with them, the look, feel and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholarrse

customer_reviews.title: Bass not so strong.
customer_reviews.text: It has less bass compared to my old no-brand wireless one. Quality is great, works on jack without charge.
customer_reviews.author: Fenyvesi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones, nice deep sound. Adjustability through the app is easy and comprehensive. Bluetooth works a treat with wired backup. Look great and feel great, and for the price not sure they can be beaten! So far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy G

customer_reviews.title: In love with them
customer_reviews.text: Stunning headphones, the most comfortable for my ears compared to any other I tried. Notable sound and great battery, 0 connectivity issues, the only complaint (if applicable) they don't fold.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound emphasising bass if anything. Brilliantly snug on the ears
customer_reviews.author: Donald Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love tgem
customer_reviews.text: There is no anc, great sound though! They do leak noise fyi
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it mainly when I’m flying long haul to see family. They are well made and with an excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chavez Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, amazing battery life, excellent sound - very impressed by these.
customer_reviews.author: Hardtoplease.

customer_reviews.title: So far so great 😃
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, the sounds is fine, noise cancelling ... hum . I live in London to cancel the noise there!? just if it’s a magic headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Eder Souza

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Very nice impressive battery live and not to bad sound quality either
customer_reviews.author: RafZ

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancelling function on these earphones
customer_reviews.text: V disappointed. They are not noise cancelling headphones - which means they are just v expensive wireless earphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nilani Sritharan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and amazing sound-quality. The headphones do leak sound, but only if you turn the volume to the max which would make you go deaf, so not really a problem. A huge letdown is the absence of a case though!
customer_reviews.author: Marc I.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all they look amazing! So many other earphones have a cheap finish to them, these look and feel premium! The sound is incredible for the price, deep rich bass. The battery life of pretty decent to I find myself charging them once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality you can trust
customer_reviews.text: Quality headphones at a good price. Wanted some over head ones instead of in Bud Bose ones I also have for the gym. These are a step up from the Bose ones. I certainly am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: andy nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality everything
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Love them. Beautiful sound, lamb leather comfort and beautifully stylish. What they lack in latest additional functions, they make up for in beautifully engineered sound. Simples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones, but could do with a case
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones, good looking, fantastic sound quality and very comfortable, only wish that for this price point B&O could at least provide a case for them, so only reason not 5*
customer_reviews.author: Kit T

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but nicey
customer_reviews.text: Love the materials used, the sound is pretty good (although I’m no audiophile, so I can’t really tell) and they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth does not connect
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a faulty product, it would not connect via Bluetooth to any phone, only works with the wire connected. I contacted the seller and sent the item back to be fixed, they told me nothing was wrong with it and sent it back still faulty!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Lovely premium headphones. Great sound. Disappointed that noise cancelling wasn't built in. Quite heavy and quite tight fit around ears.
customer_reviews.author: Happycal21

customer_reviews.title: lovely headphones
customer_reviews.text: comfortable headphones with soft band across the head, good quality sound and very stylish look.
customer_reviews.author: TAI

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quite Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but not particularly resilient, I would not for example hang them on a bag handle as in the product photo as the headband covering is very thin and damaged very quickly OK for in the house no good for travelling
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a travel bag ! Used for music
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for money, but good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, really good lows and very comfy, unfortunately the highs sound muted and the drivers make music sound edited weirdly. Definitely good, but for the same price you can easily get a better pair of sennheisers.
customer_reviews.author: danielfeldman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. Was always my first choice brand for headphones and certainly didn’t disappoint- she loves them and isn’t sure how she managed before even though she’s never claimed to be an audiophile...
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Bang and olufson live up to their brand
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly clear, if your a music person who loves a good pair if headphones, these are a bargain for the crystal clear quality and amazing response, bang and olufson live up to their brand
customer_reviews.author: ryan parkin

customer_reviews.title: Broken on one ear
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I purchased these headphones on 2nd December 2019. 3 months ago, the right hand ear padding fell off and the wire has broken and now I cannot hear out of that side. Can I return to you for free repair or return for a refund?
customer_reviews.author: chloe w.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought to use at the gym great sound quality compared to my beats
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and so comfy won’t stay on head if moving a lot :( I use mine when hoovering haha but so worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Top shelf quality was bought as a Christmas present and they couldn’t be more happy the sound was wow definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Scottjohn

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Gosh
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best purchase I have ever made for pursuing a love for music, bloody well done, well constructed and best of all, I don’t have to listen to anyone else x
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, but I expected more. Good sound, not the best noise cancelling, and the app is pretty good to.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These ear phones look great, fit well. They aren’t to heavy and have amazing sound quality. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are delightful - except they do not work with PS4, we even purchased the PS4 dongle which allegedly works any wireless headphones - but we can not get these to work
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality, good battery life & easy to use. Build quality is excellent, very comfortable to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Figgie

product_meta.title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H4 Wireless Headphones - Charcoal grey - 1643874, Charcoal Gray
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray"

Wherever the day, or night, takes you, you can listen to music the way it was meant to be heard with the Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H4 Wireless Headphones. Designed to move you as they move with you, these wireless headphones feature pristine Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound that delivers pure and well-balanced bass and treble with a clear midrange and a wide sound stage. No strings attached. 

The pure sound quality of these headphones is backed up by a clean and minimalistic Jakob Wagner design that takes things back to basics while maintaining a sleek, contemporary edge. Honest and simple materials speak to time-tested quality and put the focus where it belongs: on the pure essentials. The headband of these over-ear headphones is crafted with soft lambskin leather for longwearing comfort, as are the outsides of the memory-foam filled ear cups. The cool sliders are made with stainless steel, which has been PVD-coated and hairline-brushed to a sleek and elegant finish. Ear cup discs of stamped, polished, and anodized aluminum echo the clean look, while cords are encased in braided textile and left partially visible between the slider and headband, adding a hip and durable design touch.

Music is social, but the headphone listening experience can be very personal. With the Beoplay App, users can further personalize the experience by matching sound profiles to particular activities or environments. Select a preset ToneTouch sound profile for working out, listening to podcasts, commuting or relaxing, or the app can intuitively adjust the tonality to find a sound that suits you best.

Whether you’re exploring a new city or rediscovering your own, these lightweight Bluetooth headphones won’t slow you down. When a call comes in, simply use the on-device controls to answer and the built-in omni-directional microphone and clear Bluetooth 4.2 technology will allow you to communicate freely. The generous battery life of these headphones lets you enjoy up to 19 hours of playtime on a single 2.5-hour charge, so you can keep moving and experiencing life’s adventures set to your own soundtrack.

"
feature_bullets: Premium wireless, over-ear headphones with Bang & Olufsen signature sound
Designed with clean lines, minimalist expression and a focus on the pure essentials
Up to 19 hours of battery life with Bluetooth 4.2
High quality headphones made with leather, aluminum and steel. Sensitivity: 91 dB/mw @ 1kHz
In the box: beoplay H4 headphones, Audio cable, USB cable and quick start guide
